non_compliant.section: The entire privacy policy is not provided in the context. Therefore, a section-based compliance analysis is not possible.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy lacks information on data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.), data processing purposes, legal bases, data retention periods, and data security measures.
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific details on data collection and processing practices, legal grounds for processing, data retention policies, and data subject rights. Ensure transparency and clarity in language accessible to the average user.
